The reality is the beret comes from the Basque Country where it's called a txapela.
Basque people wear it like this,
soldiers wear it like this, girls wear something like this. The beret started in the Basque country
but it came to France because the Basque country spills over into France and there are French Basques and
it was popularized during the Paris Commune of 1871 when it was associated with being a revolutionary.
